title: it keeps freezing
body: for some of odd reason, every time I try to get in a match, my computer freeze up and wont let me play. I cant tell if its my laptop because this is  a brand new laptop. and yesterday my dad was playing on his account off my laptop and it apparently let him play on it. but not for my account I guess? But now I keep on getting put into the long waits because I "leave matches" when I really don't its just my laptop freezing :(((

replies.body: This freeze may be due to a recent Windows update, and specifically with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should get this fixed!  Let me know if you have any questions!
Same problem here. Leaving a comment in case someone knows how to fix. Of course they make the game unplayable now that they've released THE perfect gamemode (ARURF).
